name: 1 Bowl Vegan Pumpkin Muffins
description: Seriously the best vegan pumpkin muffins I've ever tasted! Perfectly spiced, soft and moist. Best of all you only need 1 bowl and 30 minutes to make them!
recipeIngredient: 1/3 cup melted vegan butter OR vegetable oil
1/2 cup soy or almond milk, unsweetened
1 cup non-dairy chocolate chips, raisins, cranberries or chopped walnuts

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F and lightly grease a muffin pan. If you use paper liners, also make sure to spray the cups lightly with oil so the muffins don't get stuck to the paper.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F and lightly grease a muffin pan. If you use paper liners, also make sure to spray the cups lightly with oil so the muffins don't get stuck to the paper.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large mixing bowl, add the pumpkin, melted vegan butter (or oil), non-dairy milk and brown sugar. Whisk until well combined and smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large mixing bowl, add the pumpkin, melted vegan butter (or oil), non-dairy milk and brown sugar. Whisk until well combined and smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Sift the flour, baking powder, salt and spices over the wet mixture (I use a fine mesh strainer for this or use a sifter).
recipeInstructions.name: Sift the flour, baking powder, salt and spices over the wet mixture (I use a fine mesh strainer for this or use a sifter).

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the dry ingredients into the wet gently using a large wooden spoon until just combined, being careful not to over mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix the dry ingredients into the wet gently using a large wooden spoon until just combined, being careful not to over mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Fold in any optional ingredients, if using, and fill the muffin cups full. Bake for 22-25 minutes, until a toothpick inserted in the middle comes out clean. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Fold in any optional ingredients, if using, and fill the muffin cups full. Bake for 22-25 minutes, until a toothpick inserted in the middle comes out clean. Enjoy!
